content: this autumn the **amigurumi school of magic** returns for a new term get the crochet magic started early with a little witch hat pattern downloadable from lovecrafts com 1 the hat is made in one piece from the tip to the brim the leaves are made separately and placed over the tip of the hat the pattern is written in us crochet terms with step-by-step images to guide you along the way the project can be made with your preferred yarn the sample was made in dk-weight cotton with 3 0mm hook > click here 2 for more information about the upcoming mystery crochet-along 1 https //www lovecrafts com/en-gb/p/catalog/product/view/id/348357 2 https //airalidesign com/en/amigurumi-school-of-magic-2/
